title: Revise a Post
content:
Hi,

I originally has a pretty poor image from a customer. Got a much better one. Is it possible to change the image in a post? Should I repost?  
What is the best option, as it seems I can't edit my previous post.

Thank you!

Fred
author: FBecht

comments.content: You can post a new message in your original thread, and attach the new image.

Send me an email with a detailed description of your post:

1. Post URL  
2. What you have  
3. What you would like it changed to

And I can take care of it.

[typographer@gmail.com](mailto:typographer@gmail.com)

Subjet = User Name\_edit post title
How do you get a "thumbnail" to show?
